snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Friday, selections include a suit against Warner Brothers by the developers of two sites based on cat memes, what Google is up to with game...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Friday, selections include a suit against Warner Brothers by the developers of two sites based on cat memes, what Google is up to with game development, and a text service aimed at fans of “Arrested Development.”

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Internet Cats Sue, and Google Games
